title:Pandapaxxy's Heresy World Drop Weapon Breakdown
description:Based on https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/1j4yguo/heresy_world_drop_weapon_breakdown/

// Boondoggle Mk. 55
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "You should get a Boondoggle Mk.55 just for the name alone. Outside of the name you have the standard low stat aggressive frame submachine gun. Subsistence is the best reload perk and Adagio, while lowering the RPM has the best damage increase." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=32287609&perks=1840239774,1087426260,1820235745,3673922083

// Boondoggle Mk. 55
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "Aggressive frame submachine guns shine brighter in PvP where their lower stability stats can usually be bumped with perks that supplement instead of fighting for damage perks. To the Pain increases your aim assist while you're fighting, whereas Closing Time only assists as your magazine gets lower. Hip-Fire Grip is also another option if you run-and-gun a lot. Tap the Trigger is gonna be the best for keeping accuracy as the stability is already pretty low to begin with." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller

// Boondoggle Mk. 55
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "Aggressive frame submachine guns shine brighter in PvP where their lower stability stats can usually be bumped with perks that supplement instead of fighting for damage perks. To the Pain increases your aim assist while you're fighting, whereas Closing Time only assists as your magazine gets lower. Hip-Fire Grip is also another option if you run-and-gun a lot. Tap the Trigger is gonna be the best for keeping accuracy as the stability is already pretty low to begin with." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb
dimwishlist:item=32287609&perks=3250034553,1885400500,3938834702,1890422124

// Admetus-D
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "There's not a lot that needs to be said about Admetus-D. It has a great reload perk in Rapid Hit, paired with an equally good damage perk in Precision Instrument. Or you can opt for Repulsor Brace and Withering Gaze for Void synergy. Then you could also go for a general purpose scout with Recycled Energy being a nice new perk to top off your ability charges." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Quite the interesting revival of this long forgotten frame. We have not one, but TWO additions to this archetype introduced way back in Season 12. For those of you who forget time. That was Beyond Light launch on November 10, 2020. Cruoris FR4 is interesting with Discord giving nearly infinite ammo, and Recycled Energy topping off low ability charges. Barrel Constrictor helps the horizontal spread a bit, while One for All works well at clearing groups of enemies with ease." Recommended MW: Charge Time.|tags:pve,mkb,controller
